channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The 2026 BMW iX3 voice assistant will be powered by Alexa+
item.description: The launch is one part of Amazon's effort to bring its LLM-powered voice and digital assistant to every device — whether handheld or in the driver's s...

item.title: ‘Shogun’ Creator Says Season 2 ‘Defies Expectations’
item.description: The historical series Shogun was an international hit that won a record 18 Emmy Awards. With production on season 2 starting, the writer and executive...

item.title: Lego Smart Bricks introduce a new way to build — and they don’t require screens
item.description: Lego developed a custom ASIC chip that allows its new Ssmart Bricks to pick up on signals from surrounding Smart Tags that dictate how it should make ...

item.title: Magnesium Supplements Crash Course (2026): Benefits and Side Effects
item.description: Promises of better sleep—and better poops—are driving the magnesium supplements craze.

item.title: Lego’s Smart Brick Gives the Iconic Analog Toy a New Digital Brain
item.description: The new sensor-packed Smart Play Brick will land this spring as part of a special Star Wars collection. The update adds interactive lights and sound t...

item.title: China’s Hesai will double production as lidar sensor industry shakes out
item.description: Hesai said it now plans to build as many as 4 million lidar sensors in 2026, up from 2 million, as it tries to corner a market with one fewer player a...

item.title: These On-Ear Beats Headphones Are Marked Down by $70
item.description: What these headphones lack in active noise canceling, they make up for with big, bold sound.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Trifold Hands-On: This Is the Phone-Tablet Hybrid You’re Looking For
item.description: At CES 2026, we went hands-on with the three-panel Samsung tablet that folds up to the size of a (large) phone.

item.title: Offshore wind developers sue Trump administration for halting $25B in projects
item.description: The lawsuits seek to reverse the Department of the Interior's stop-work order, which affected five offshore wind projects off the Eastern Seaboard.

item.title: Hacktivist deletes white supremacist websites live onstage during hacker conference
